articles.title: “Gaming Chromebooks” with Nvidia GPUs apparently killed with little fanfare - Ars Technica
articles.description: Most Chromebook gaming will have to take place in the cloud, at least for now.
articles.content:
Enlarge/ Asus' Chromebook Flip CX5 was one of the streaming-oriented gaming Chromebooks announced late last year.

articles.title: Burj Khalifa-sized asteroid, 4 other space rocks hurtling towards Earth; check speed, other details - HT Tech
articles.description: NASA has revealed details about 5 asteroids that will pass by Earth closely in the next few days. Shockingly, one of them is a Potentially Hazardous Asteroid that is nearly as big as the Burj Khalifa, the tallest building in the world! Know details.
